name: commerce-sdk-integration-test
description: Salesforce Commerce Cloud SDK Integration Test

scripts.redis: docker rm --force redis-commerce-sdk; docker run -dp 6379:6379 --name redis-commerce-sdk redis:5-alpine
scripts.redis:debug: docker rm --force redis-commerce-sdk-debug; docker run -dp 6379:6379 --name redis-commerce-sdk-debug redis:5-alpine && docker exec -it redis-commerce-sdk-debug redis-cli monitor
scripts.pack:sdk: npm pack ../packages/core && npm pack ../packages/generator && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:basic && npm run test:redis
